Package org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.validators

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OAuth2TokenValidator
    OAuth2 access token Validators should implement this interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultOAuth2TokenValidator
    Default OAuth2 access token validator that supports "bearer" token type.
    JDBCScopeValidator
    The JDBC Scope Validation implementation.
    OAuth2JWTTokenValidator
    JWT Access token validator
    OAuth2ScopeHandler
    Scope handling extension during token issue.
    OAuth2ScopeValidator
    This class should be extended by all OAuth2 Scope Validators.
    OAuth2TokenValidationMessageContext  
    OIDCScopeHandler
    Scope handler for token requests with openid scope.
    RefreshTokenValidator  
    SAML1GrantValidator  
    TokenValidationHandler
    Handles the token validation by invoking the proper validation handler by looking at the token type.
